title: Why did Elton John call Jesus gay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, you are dragging up a story from 2010… Still, Elton John claimed rightly that Jesus was compassionate, loving and forgiving[1] . And then made an interesting point about the lack of compassion, lack of forgiveness and downright hatred thrown at gay people. Perhaps his provocative comment was to highlight the hypocrisy of many religious people when it comes to homosexuality. Whether Jesus was gay or not, I can’t help feeling that he would have been far more compassionate and loving towards the gay community than some of those who worship in his name. Footnotes[1] Sir Elton John claims Jesus was gay

Okay Elton didn’t *BUT* There are certainly hints that John the apostle may have been. He is described as “the Disciple Jesus Loved” and reclined with Jesus and laid on his chest at the last supper. This doesn’t make him gay, but to be fair, I don’t know many men who would like a guy lying on their chest. There are other things as well, but it’s really important we don’t view the bible through our culture but try and understand it in the context and time that it was written.
